title: Venom – The Birth of Carnage, A PlayStation Exclusive Extended Sneak Peek
author: PlayStation
description:
Watch the birth of Carnage in this exclusive extended sneak peek from VENOM: LET THERE BE CARNAGE – exclusively in movie theaters tomorrow. Get tickets now: https://www.venom.movie

Tom Hardy returns to the big screen as the lethal protector Venom, one of MARVEL’s greatest and most complex characters. Directed by Andy Serkis, written by Kelly Marcel with the story by Tom Hardy & Marcel, the film also stars Michelle Williams, Naomie Harris and Woody Harrelson, in the role of the villain Cletus Kasady/Carnage.

localize.title: Venom - The Birth of Carnage, A PlayStation Exclusive Extended Sneak Peek
